Branding solution

Construction – Real estate

Brandast provides a branding solution package for real estate companies based on industry specific characteristics. Service suitable for real estate businesses, construction, trading floors ...
  • ITEMS OF DESIGN
  • DESIGN PROCESS
  • WHY CHOOSE BRANDAST
  • PROJECTS

Design package for real estate - construction businesses

Core identification

  • 01 - Brand name

    Brand name is the first point when customers contact with businesses

  • 02 - Composition slogan

    Creating a brand slogan contributes to convey the message and brand differentiation values to target customers

  • 03 - Logo design

    Designing a brand logo, ensuring the aesthetic criteria and conveying the brand's target messages
Exclusive trademark registration

  • 01 - Registration of trademark protection

    Consulting & registration of trademark protection for trademarks

  • 02 - Register copyright

    Consulting & performing copyright registration for the logo of the brand
General identification system

  • 01 - Office application design (basic)

    Business cards - Envelopes (3 sizes) - Letterhead - File clip - Email signature template - Presentation powerpoint template

  • 02 - Designing extended applications

    Membership Card - VIP Card - Discount Voucher - Gift Bag - Gift Box - Thank you letter with envelope

  • 03 - Design of gift publications system

    Badges - Flags - Raincoats - Umbrellas - Notebooks - Data USB - Key hanger - Water dispenser - Cup / cup set - Flowerpot - Wall clock - Travel suitcase - Gift box - Paper bag / Cloth bag

  • 01 - Identify uniforms

    Front desk uniform - Male / female staff uniform (shirt, pants, skirt) - Picnic uniform (T-shirt, hat) - Employee name card (shirt) - Staff tag

  • 02 - Identify signboards

    Legal sign - Signboard hanging over the head - Waving sign - Parking notice sign - Warning sign of opening / closing time - Reception desk - Backdrop reception backdrop - Seats, waiting area

  • 03 - Advertising publications

    Leaflets - Standee - Poster - Banner - Notice template - Service brochure - Newspaper ad templates - Big billboard

  • 01 - Event identifier

    Theater - Conference font - Speech podium - Invitation letter - Letter of appreciation - Invitation envelope - 4-seater, 7-seater car - Staff shuttle

  • 02 - Profile Design

    Content editing - Business photography - Design complete - Printing

  • 03 - Website Design

    Website interface design - Complete programming
